mapper.select: select id, advisor_id, advisor_name, advisor_type, order_num, ext_param, status, create_time, update_time from ai_client_advisor where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ai_client_advisor(advisor_id, advisor_name, advisor_type, order_num, ext_param, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{advisorId}, #{advisorName}, #{advisorType}, #{orderNum}, #{extParam}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into ai_client_advisor(advisor_id, advisor_name, advisor_type, order_num, ext_param, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.advisorId}, #{entity.advisorName}, #{entity.advisorType}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.extParam}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into ai_client_advisor(advisor_id, advisor_name, advisor_type, order_num, ext_param, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.advisorId}, #{entity.advisorName}, #{entity.advisorType}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.extParam}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update advisor_id = values(advisor_id), advisor_name = values(advisor_name), advisor_type = values(advisor_type), order_num = values(order_num), ext_param = values(ext_param), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update ai_client_advisor
advisor_id = #{advisorId},
advisor_name = #{advisorName},
advisor_type = #{advisorType},
order_num = #{orderNum},
ext_param = #{extParam},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
